title: How to get Arg in Ollydbg
content:
I am In A deep Trouble. I am New to Reverse Engineering. I am Currently Using OLLYDBG. Now, I was Trying to Crack the Password of a .exe file using Ollydbg Now, The EXE file which i was trying to crack was By Watching some Youtube Video 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gSOKmNk-sA
Now, Look at this Screenshot ( This is Took from Video) When i Try the Same Application to Reverse on My System, I don't see any Arg1,Arg2,Arg3 kind of thing. Now, Can Anybody tell me How to get those Arg1,Arg2.... In my Panel too. Because the Password of this Executable file is Meant to be there. And The Registers are same, But i couldnt find those arg1,arg2 in Mine.. Please Help

comments.text: The anonymous downvoter was here. Seriously, why was this downvoted?

answers_data.content: same as blabb's answer : hit ctrl+A
